# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="50ebf-102">Recibos de leitura</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="50ebf-103">Para pedir um recibo de leitura ou de um recibo de entrega da mensagem:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="50ebf-104">Seleccione três pontos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="50ebf-105">na parte superior da mensagem compor painel.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="50ebf-106">Seleccione **Mostrar opções de mensagem**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="50ebf-107">Seleccione **Pedir recibo de leitura** ou **Pedir um recibo de entrega**ou ambos.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="50ebf-108">Para escolher a forma como o Outlook responde a pedidos de recibo de leitura, vá para</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="50ebf-109">**Definições de** > **Ver todas as definições do Outlook** > **tratamento de mensagens**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="50ebf-110">Para mais informações, consulte [os recibos de leitura no Outlook na web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="50ebf-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
